extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade PaperCut
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade PaperCut to the latest version to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is it possible to immediately patch PaperCut?
Which network control option to implement?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement External Network Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Block all inbound traffic from external IP addresses to the web management portal (port 9191 and 9192 by default).

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Internal and External Network Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Block all traffic inbound to the web management portal. Note: The server cannot be managed remotely after this step.

extracted_playbook.title: Mandate Phishing-Resistant MFA
extracted_playbook.description: Mandate phishing-resistant multifactor authentication (MFA) for all staff and for all services.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Comprehensive Information Security Program
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a comprehensive information security program based on a recognized framework, such as the NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF).
